text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly addresses the need to name the child in question by name in estate planning documents. Specifically, under Section 2 (Revocable Living Trust), it advises to include 'Specific bequests (e.g., \u201cmy 2022 Honda Civic to my youngest daughter, Emma\u201d)' and 'A primary beneficiary clause naming the youngest for the bulk of the trust assets.'
